p: Our smartphones are increasingly unlocking the power of AI and machine learning to provide accurate and real-time insight into various aspects of healthcare. Smartphones can utilize GPS or Bluetooth technologies for contact tracing purposes. Although contact tracing may seem challenging, previous epidemics have been effectively controlled through contact tracing and isolation initiatives [ 3, 42]. To assist in COVID-19 contact tracing, a mobile app called TraceTogether is currently being used in Singapore [ 43]. The app uses Bluetooth technology to identify individuals that have been in close contact with patients who have been diagnosed with COVID-19.
